snippet.title: POLY UNIVERSE gameplay: Settle & Build on Tiny Worlds! (Early Access game)
snippet.description:
Poly Universe gameplay! See this new strategy game in action, ordering your lads to gather, farm, build, set up industry & fight aliens!
► Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/randomiseuser

We check out a cool new strategy game out for PC, Mac and Linux in this let's play Poly Universe gameplay video.

We start our look at Poly Universe gameplay by having our settlers crash-land on a temperature but tiny planet of green islands and fish-filled oceans. We have to gather wood and stone, then build houses, and develop more resources and industry until we're thriving - right up until the aliens invade!

We play the first 25 minutes of the early access game in this let's play Poly Universe gameplay video, running for an in-game year or so. Gameplay beyond this point includes expanding to nearby planets and setting up trade routes between them.

Buy Poly Universe game download on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/801040/Poly_Universe/

=====

Official Poly Universe gameplay info:

"A tiny band of settlers land on a remote planet. With you as their leader they will either build a new civilization, or be consumed by the foul creatures which inhabit the furthest reaches of space.

In Poly Universe worlds are tiny but numerous. Be strategic in laying out your cities to maximize the limited space available on each world. Balance industry and residential buildings to keep your citizens happy. But don't neglect the defenses necessary to keep them safe! 

Establishing trade routes between worlds will allow your planets to specialize and share resources, pushing the boundaries of your civilization even further outwards."

Developed by: Pouchmouse
Poly Universe release date: 20 July 2018
Formats available: PC Windows, Mac OSX, SteamOS + Linux
